price: (2) And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed Allāh is ever, of what you do, Aware.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kāna bimā taʿmalūna khabīran
